tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE likes (
  like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  comment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
